Text: These files can be used in goldendict application wherever goldendict can be installed or used not only unix systems. It means these files can be used in windows.

The android version of goldendict can be downloaded from the following link.

https://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/7658546/GoldenDict_v1.3.0_By_bobiras2009

So these dictionaries can be used in android.
